ch0063_00_renbu/0101_0701_01_10:
There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Now we start our training!
ch0063_00_renbu/0101_0701_02_10:
Practicing every day is the key to
becoming the ultimate Trainer!
ch0063_00_renbu/0601_0701_01_10:
The PML! A battleground that only the mightiest
of warriors are allowed to set foot in!
ch0063_00_renbu/0601_0701_02_10:
No other festival could make my spirit tremble
like this one does!
ch0063_00_renbu/0601_0701_03_10:
I shall participate, find all of the strong Trainers,
and overwhelm them with decisive strength!
ch0063_00_renbu/0601_0701_04_10:
This is a battle to perfect our strength!
Even Conkeldurr is more tense than usual!
ch0063_00_renbu/0601_0702_01_10:
Now’s my chance to show the world the results
of my training!
ch0063_00_renbu/0601_0702_02_10:
Conkeldurr and I will support you and your
Pokémon to the limits of our strength!
ch0063_00_renbu/0602_0701_01_10:
Mienshao is a Pokémon that uses a graceful
martial art.
ch0063_00_renbu/0602_0701_02_10:
Elegant and efficient movements!
That is the secret to Mienshao’s strength!
ch0063_00_renbu/0602_0701_03_10:
I refer to their efficient movements 
when I train as well!
ch0063_00_renbu/0602_0702_01_10:
Power isn’t just being bigger or physically
stronger than your opponent.
ch0063_00_renbu/0602_0702_02_10:
Being able to generate maximum force with
minimum movement! That’s what leads to victory!
ch0063_00_renbu/0603_0701_01_10:
Concrete has become a necessity in
modern construction.
ch0063_00_renbu/0603_0701_02_10:
With good reason, too!
It’s hard and sturdy and withstands the rain 
and wind while towering over all of us.
ch0063_00_renbu/0603_0701_04_10: You feel this from concrete, too, don’t you?
ch0063_00_renbu/0603_0702_01_10:
It’s said that Conkeldurr is the one that taught
us how to make concrete.
ch0063_00_renbu/0603_0702_02_10:
In a way, Conkeldurr is wielding his own power
when he commands and controls concrete!
ch0063_00_renbu/0604_0701_01_10:
At my core, I am a martial artist, and what is
most important to a martial artist is spirit,
technique, and body.
ch0063_00_renbu/0604_0701_02_10:
A spirit that will allow you to hold on to your
convictions... A technique that you hone...
A body that is hardened through training...
ch0063_00_renbu/0604_0701_03_10:
These three elements are the key to strength!
And those are what I focus on!
ch0063_00_renbu/0604_0701_04_10:
Engrave that into your spirit and body.
That will be your first lesson!
ch0063_00_renbu/0604_0702_01_10:
I have styled my hair so that it does not impede
me during training or fights!
ch0063_00_renbu/0604_0702_02_10:
Long hair can even get in the way of
your opponents.
ch0063_00_renbu/0604_0702_03_10:
Grooming yourself is also important for combat,
and I make sure to groom myself regularly!
ch0063_00_renbu/0605_0701_01_10: I have a master. Alder is his name.
ch0063_00_renbu/0605_0701_02_10:
He is the oldest Champion in Unovan history,
and he represents what I aim to achieve!
ch0063_00_renbu/0605_0701_03_10:
I always have and always will strive to be
the best!
ch0063_00_renbu/0605_0701_04_10:
I will defeat both Master Alder and you and
continue training for greater heights!
ch0063_00_renbu/0605_0701_05_10:
I have sworn to dedicate my life to the last
breath to perfectly honing my skills!
ch0063_00_renbu/0605_0702_01_10: My strength is not a means to any end.
ch0063_00_renbu/0605_0702_02_10:
My aim is to hone and perfect my own strength,
and that is my only aim.
ch0063_00_renbu/0605_0702_03_10: That is my motivation. No, that is my life itself!
ch0063_00_renbu/1701_0701_02_10:
You even made me acknowledge your strength.
That is why I want you to reach greater heights
along with me by whatever means you can!
ch0063_00_renbu/1701_0702_01_10:
Conkeldurr and I are both seeking out 
strong Trainers and Pokémon.
ch0063_00_renbu/1701_0702_02_10:
The two of us are looking forward 
to how strong you will become!
ch0063_00_renbu/2501_0701_01_10:
I’ve gone all over the world single-mindedly
pursuing strength.
ch0063_00_renbu/2501_0701_02_10:
That’s when I met Master Alder. He taught me 
the wonders of pursuing strength, and thus I
became a member of the Elite Four.
ch0063_00_renbu/2501_0701_03_10:
You have a peculiar power to make me
remember those days.
ch0063_00_renbu/2501_0702_01_10:
A spirit that desires strength and the will to
know what it means to be the strongest...
I can sense you possess both.
ch0063_00_renbu/2501_0702_02_10:
I know you will become stronger,
but I will not lose to you!
ch0063_00_renbu/2501_0702_03_10:
Because that spirit and that will are just as
present in myself as well!
ch0063_00_renbu/2511_0701_01_10:
Even if I lose a battle, as long as I have gotten
stronger, I consider that a victory against myself.
ch0063_00_renbu/2511_0701_02_10:
With that in mind, whenever you battle, look
at your opponent, look at your Pokémon!
And most importantly, look at yourself!
ch0063_00_renbu/2511_0701_03_10:
You can become much stronger! And if you do,
I can become even stronger as well!
ch0063_00_renbu/2511_0702_01_10:
What I desire is a battle with a Trainer that has
the perseverance and strength of will to be true
to themselves!
ch0063_00_renbu/2511_0702_02_10:
And you’re true to yourself and your convictions.
That is why you are able to become stronger!
ch0063_00_renbu/3001_0701_01_10:
Ah, it’s morning! Time to stand tall and surpass
the weaker person you were yesterday!
ch0063_00_renbu/3002_0701_01_10:
If you’re still sleepy, go splash water on your
face. I guarantee it’ll wake you right up!
ch0063_00_renbu/3003_0701_01_10:
The sun is high. Now is the time to train!
Focus your mind and body!
ch0063_00_renbu/3004_0701_01_10:
Try to maintain good eating habits.
A healthy body is a must for martial arts.
ch0063_00_renbu/3005_0701_01_10:
Night is the perfect time to reflect and
center yourself. Meditation is yet another
part of training...
ch0063_00_renbu/3006_0701_01_10:
Rest is an important part of training!
Don’t overdo it. Take a break when you need to.
